title: Cohorts
text: Hack.Diversity has had 8 program cycles, with its first cohort beginning in 2017. Hack.Diversity has since welcomed over 644 Fellows into the program with the 2024 program welcoming 105 Fellows with 88 in Boston and 17 in New York.

title: Cohorts
text: Hack.Diversity has had 8 program cycles, with its first cohort beginning in 2017. Hack.Diversity has since welcomed over 644 Fellows into the program with the 2024 program welcoming 105 Fellows with 88 in Boston and 17 in New York.

title: Home
text:
Welcome to Hack.Diversity’s internal home page. The purpose of this site and pages is to be enable Hack.Diversity to become a more self-service data organization where Team members can go from ideation, validation, and proposal without needing to go through gatekeepers.
Access the following:

Application Data
Cohort Data
Current Fellow Dashboard
Partner Data

Please note that this is a new thing and a work in progress. I hope you find the information useful and if you have any comments or suggestions, please share those with me and the whole team here.



West Coast is the best coast!

title: About
text:
This website highlights key data from our fellows.

library(tidyverse)

── Attaching core tidyverse packages ──────────────────────── tidyverse 2.0.0 ──
✔ dplyr     1.1.4     ✔ readr     2.1.5

✔ ggplot2   3.5.1     ✔ tibble    3.2.1

df <- 
  readRDS("all_cohort_data_copy") |> 
  filter(year==2024)

df |> nrow()

[1] 105
